text: How do you make a clean environment which does not build on any other environments? I thought that’s what `activate`ing a new directory was supposed to do, but it seems to “inherit” packages from the generic environment

text: You modify your LOAD_PATH not to include other environments.

text: That seems... neither user-friendly nor sensible. There needs to be an easy way to specify this when you activate an environment for the first time.
